record.condition: evaluate(app.control in $L.phase) and (filename($L.file)="cm3r" and evaluate(approvals in $G.cm3r.environment) and lng(denull(approval.groups in $G.cm3r.environment))>0 and (lng($L.approval.intersect)>0 or approve.override in $G.cm3r.environment) or filename($L.file)="cm3t" and evaluate(approvals in $G.cm3t.environment) and lng(denull(approval.groups in $G.cm3t.environment))>0 and (lng($L.approval.intersect)>0 or approve.override in $G.cm3t.environment)) and open in $L.filed=true and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false
record.condition.txt: evaluate(app.control in $L.phase) and (filename($L.file)="cm3r" and evaluate(approvals in $G.cm3r.environment) and lng(denull(approval.groups in $G.cm3r.environment))>0 and (lng($L.approval.intersect)>0 or approve.override in $G.cm3r.environment) or filename($L.file)="cm3t" and evaluate(approvals in $G.cm3t.environment) and lng(denull(approval.groups in $G.cm3t.environment))>0 and (lng($L.approval.intersect)>0 or approve.override in $G.cm3t.environment)) and open in $L.filed=true and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false
